Class MessageContextFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oracle.webservices.api.message.MessageContextFactory
      • com.sun.xml.ws.api.message.MessageContextFactory
  • public class MessageContextFactory
extends MessageContextFactory
    The MessageContextFactory implements com.oracle.webservices.api.message.MessageContextFactory as a factory of Packet and public facade of Codec(s).

    shih-chang.chen@oracle.com
